page.title: 16LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The area under study is policed by members of the North Yorkshire Police Force whose headquarters is at Newby Wiske near Northallerton. The local constables are under the control of a Police Sergeant based in Leyburn where there is a Police Office. The Police Office is only manned during day-time hours - help after office hours is obtained by contacting the Richmond Police Station. The local police patrol the area in cars. There is a magistrates court which is held in Thornborough Hall every second Friday during the year. The 'bench' is known as the 'Hang-West' bench. Police use radio, telephone and computer forms of communication in their work.
